name: Gnomad!
description:
Oh no! The hive has been shattered by the natural enemy of the bees, the beetle, poorly masquerading as a bee-eetle! It is the destiny of this Gnomad to rescue all the bees and reunite them with their Queen!

Controls:

Left/right arrows -> move
Space -> jump
C -> send bees to attack

Credits:

Special thanks to all of the wonderful people in the velopman Twitch chat. Without whom this game wouldn't nearly anywhere as fun / silly!

Idea: velopman, b33bytes & the loving and always supportive chatroom
Game dev: velopman
Art: b33bytes & Cavedens

Voice acting:
Queen & blob: b33bytes
Gnomad: velopman
Boss: incompetent_ian

Music: velopman

Font: https://www.dafont.com/dogica.font
